column2: "Woohoo, thanks! I see, I see. So this is the Mech-like hostile I've heard about?..."
"...this is completely different. It's neither Mech nor Darker. It's from a different world. It's really amazing!"
"First, where did this come from? Some savage planet? Or some other world where our knowledge doesn't reach?"
"Nevertheless, thanks to you they were useful as good references!"
"This is your reward! Thanks again! Things are steadily calming down, and I just want it to just to be over already!"
